title: Casinos, Camping & Porn Shoots (feat. Dave Attell & Jeff Ross)
description: Jeff Ross and Dave Attell talk about performing in Vegas and picking the right people to roast. Cameraman Corey accidentally worked on a porno & Dan recalls a snoring nightmare during Comedy Camp.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
content:encoded: Jeff Ross and Dave Attell talk about performing in Vegas and picking the right people to roast. Cameraman Corey accidentally worked on a porno & Dan recalls a snoring nightmare during Comedy Camp.
